participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and creative, Emily loves to express herself through dance and baking.
participant_1.background: My family is supportive of me and my dance team. I am a stay-at-home mom to my two daughters. I only use apple products because I feel everything else is inferior. I dance ballet. I am still trying to lose weight.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Artistic and down-to-earth, Sarah enjoys baking and creating a cozy home for her family.
participant_2.background: I enjoy dressing up as a spooky creature for Halloween. I made many memories with my family last year. Everyone says my pecan pie is the best they have ever had. I have worked at my current job for two years and I am looking forward to moving to a new home in a quiet area where I can focus on my art. I am a humble baker.

content.text: I'm a stay-at-home mom to two beautiful little girls. They keep me on my toes!
Hi! I am also a mom, though I work full-time. How do you balance being a mom and your career?
I'm a stay-at-home mom so I'm lucky in that regard. I get to be with my kids all day long.
That's great! I wish I could be home with my kids all day, but I love my job too.
What do you do for work?
I'm a baker. I love making delicious pastries and cakes.
That sounds like a fun job! I love to bake too. I'm not as good as you are, though.
Practice makes perfect! I've been baking for years.
I'm sure you're right. I'll have to keep practicing.
You should! I'd love to try some of your baked goods sometime.
Great! I'll bring some of my pecan pie over for you to try.
That sounds delicious! I can't wait.
Me neither! I'm glad we met.
